creator: Gamesture sp. z o.o.
descriptionHtml:
Embark on an epic quest in this thrilling RPG adventure game with good graphics! Battle hundreds of monsters and bosses. Build your knight using character creator, collect epic gear, compete in guild wars & PvP duels. Defeat the evil and bathe in glory and fame!

One of the most classic RPG games out there!
🧙‍♂️ Single player game packed with fast paced action & magic!
📖 Immerse yourself in amazing story-based play and hero quests
🔝 Truly dynamic hero upgrade - level up and watch how fast your progress is!
🦹‍♀️ Enjoy a deep character customization with hundreds of looks to choose from!
💎 Learn how to loot and rank above other players
👹 Battle mighty monsters in tactical turn-based combat
🌟 Make use of heroes shop and forge to awake your legendary gear into artifacts!
🗡️ Make tactical use of your skills and weapons on PvP arena
🗺️ Start your amazing adventure in a magic world!
🛡️⚔️Join guild of heroes, fight bosses together in exciting PvE raids & campaigns
🏆 Addicting weekly battle events with stunning knight equipment as rewards


Play with friends or solo. Join one of the quest games out there and deep dive into a fantasy game of your dreams!

Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fantasy RPG full of epic loot, turn based battles and hero quests!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This small update brings small in-house improvements and minor bug-fixes.

title: Questland: Turn Based RPG

creator: Gamesture sp. z o.o.
descriptionHtml:
Face hundreds of challenging quests & events in this fantasy RPG game with unique graphic style!

Customize and build your own character, collect epic gear, equip your hero with powerful artifacts and climb the rankings! Join the guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic multiplayer guild wars to rule the world of Valia!

One of the top rated online RPG games out there!
📖 Immerse yourself in an amazing storyline, defeat evil and bask in glory and fame!
🦹‍♀️ Enjoy a deep character customization with hundreds of looks & skins to choose from
🔝 Dynamic hero evolution - level up your hero, upgrade gear, unlock talents and magic skills to boost your hero power
🗡️ Collect legendary gear, forge mighty artifacts, and use their power to your advantage
🏆 Complete dozens of Quest Events and battle your way to the top of the ranking!
👹 Defeat powerful monsters and bosses in fantasy turn-based combat
⚔️ Challenge other players in PvP battles and reach the top of the Arena
🗺️ Fight in the action-packed PvE campaign and discover a fantasy world
🏰 See the variety of locations: discover the city, visit shops, craft in the forge, embark on voyages
🏕️ Join multiplayer guild boss battles and lead your guild to victory!
🛡️ Take part in addictive weekly Battle Events with stunning equipment as a reward

A real treat for every dungeons & dragons fan and one of the most interesting quest games out there. Prepare yourself for the fantasy role-playing game like you’ve never experienced before!

Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: The ultimate mobile RPG with a character creator & skins!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this update we've made a number of tweaks, including:
- Changed the main splash screen
- Fixed notification badge glitch on Home
- Fixed graphical issues in Boutique and Arena on taller devices
- Fixed mail confirmation pop-up (check custom settings)
- Other UI tweaks

title: Questland: Turn Based RPG

creator: Gamesture sp. z o.o.
descriptionHtml:
Embark on an epic quest in this thrilling RPG adventure game!

Battle hundreds of mighty monsters and bosses. Customize your character, collect powerful equipment, compete in guilds, defeat the evil and bathe in glory and fame!

One of the most epic RPG games out there!
👨 Single player hero game packed with action!
⏫ Truly dynamic hero upgrade - leveling up has never felt so satisfying!
🦹‍♀️ Enjoy a deep character customization with hundreds of looks to choose from!
🗡️ Collect epic loot and rank above other players
📖 Immerse yourself in amazing storyline and heroes quests
👹 Battle mighty monsters in deadly turn based combat
👻 Investigate spooky PvE dungeons!
⚔️ Make tactical use of your combat skills
🗺️ Start your amazing adventure in a thrilling PvE campaign
🛡️ Join a guild of heroes, play and chat with other guild members!
🏅 Addicting weekly live events with legendary loot as rewards!


Join one of the best quest games out there and deep dive into a fantasy adventure of your dreams!

Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.

title: Questland: Turn Based RPG

creator: Gamesture sp. z o.o.
descriptionHtml:
Face hundreds of challenging quests & events in this fantasy RPG game with unique graphic style!

Customize and build your own character, collect epic gear, equip your hero with powerful artifacts and climb the rankings! Join the guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic multiplayer guild wars to rule the world of Valia!

One of the top rated online RPG games out there!
📖 Immerse yourself in an amazing storyline, defeat evil and bask in glory and fame!
🦹‍♀️ Enjoy a deep character customization with hundreds of looks & skins to choose from
🔝 Dynamic hero evolution - level up your hero, upgrade gear, unlock talents and magic skills to boost your hero power
🗡️ Collect legendary gear, forge mighty artifacts, and use their power to your advantage
🏆 Complete dozens of Quest Events and battle your way to the top of the ranking!
👹 Defeat powerful monsters and bosses in fantasy turn-based combat
⚔️ Challenge other players in PvP battles and reach the top of the Arena
🗺️ Fight in the action-packed PvE campaign and discover a fantasy world
🏰 See the variety of locations: discover the city, visit shops, craft in the forge, embark on voyages
🏕️ Join multiplayer guild boss battles and lead your guild to victory!
🛡️ Take part in addictive weekly Battle Events with stunning equipment as a reward

A real treat for every dungeons & dragons fan and one of the most interesting quest games out there. Prepare yourself for the fantasy role-playing game like you’ve never experienced before!

Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Reach the top of Newcomers ranking, expand your guild and recruit new members - all on this new update!
- Added new guild invitation system
- Added new activity indicator to guilds
- Added "Newcomers" ranking to Hall of Fame
- Added alerts when fighting guildmates in the Arena
- Added extra spin button to Tavern
- Fixed incorrect alerts when changing guilds during Battle Event
- Fixed glitched rewards in Battle Event's bosses
- Other fixes, behind-the-scenes improvements and optimizations

Customize and build your own character, collect epic gear, equip your hero with powerful artifacts and climb the rankings! Join the guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic multiplayer guild wars to rule the world of Valia!

One of the top rated online RPG games out there!
📖 Immerse yourself in an amazing storyline, defeat evil and bask in glory and fame!
🦹‍♀️ Enjoy a deep character customization with hundreds of looks & skins to choose from
🔝 Dynamic hero evolution - level up your hero, upgrade gear, unlock talents and magic skills to boost your hero power
🗡️ Collect legendary gear, forge mighty artifacts, and use their power to your advantage
🏆 Complete dozens of Quest Events and battle your way to the top of the ranking!
👹 Defeat powerful monsters and bosses in fantasy turn-based combat
⚔️ Challenge other players in PvP battles and reach the top of the Arena
🗺️ Fight in the action-packed PvE campaign and discover a fantasy world
🏰 See the variety of locations: discover the city, visit shops, craft in the forge, embark on voyages
🏕️ Join multiplayer guild boss battles and lead your guild to victory!
🛡️ Take part in addictive weekly Battle Events with stunning equipment as a reward

A real treat for every dungeons & dragons fan and one of the most interesting quest games out there. Prepare yourself for the fantasy role-playing game like you’ve never experienced before!

Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.

title: Questland: Turn Based RPG

creator: Gamesture sp. z o.o.
descriptionHtml:
Meet the RPG game of the next generation. Create your character, collect epic gear, equip your hero with powerful artifacts and climb the rankings. And it’s just the beginning of what Questland, one of the top rated roleplay games, has to offer!

Questland features!
- Amazing storyline - defeat evil and bask in glory and fame!
- Deep character customization with hundreds of looks & skins to choose from
- Dynamic hero upgrade - level up, boost your gear, unlock magic talents
- Tons of legendary gear & mighty artifacts - ready to craft in the hero forge
- Dozens of quests & events - battle your way to the top of the ranking!
- Powerful monsters and bosses from well-known fantasy universes
- PvP arena duels - reach the top of the magic arena
- Action-packed PvE campaign - discover grim dungeons and dragons lair in tactical turn-based combat
- Variety of locations - discover the city, visit shops, craft in the forge, embark on voyages
- Multiplayer guild raids - lead your guild to victory!
- Addictive weekly Battle Events with stunning equipment as a reward

RPG with character creator
Like in most role-playing games, you have to create your epic hero from scratch. Make use of beautiful armors, mighty weapons, shields and helmets to adjust your look. Face challenging quests and events in this RPG fantasy game with thousands of ways to customize character. Get special cosmetics and skins to stand out in the crowd!

Complete hero quest with ease
Idle RPG games don’t have to be hard. Especially when you are able to level up so fast! Conquer thousands of vile monsters to gain experience. Smelt, craft, reforge, extract and make your mates jealous! It’s a dream come true for every fan of RPG online games who looks for an immersive, medieval experience.

Collect resources & essential items
Get idle loot, gold, eternium, empowering stone, and upgrade your equipment. Collect armors, almighty rings, magic weapons with great passive skills and much more. Enhance and awaken your gear and orbs: from common to legendary. Choose from hundreds of weapons and talent combinations that no other idle RPG games can offer.

Defeat monsters and players on your way!
Whether you’re an old school player or completely newbie to turn-based games, Questland lets you feel the thrill of co-op fighting like no other online RPG games. Challenge players in the PvP arena. Battle hordes of monsters grinding the PvE campaign. The more you fight in this hero role-playing game, the more XP you can get.

Begin your journey
Questland is the one of the most dynamic RPG adventure games in the role-playing genre. Explore the grim medieval world. Start your epic journey to fight and defeat the ultimate boss - the Shadow. Who will be the most victorious champion of Valia? End the war and become a legend!

Help your guildmates
Join the guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic multiplayer guild raids to rule the world of Valia! Collaborate with guild members and get rewards for the ranking. Unite with knights and mages in one of the most cooperative multiplayer RPG games!

A real treat for every dungeons and dragons fan and one of the most interesting quest games out there. Prepare yourself for an adventure RPG like you’ve never experienced before!

Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.

RPGs don’t have to be hard. Especially when you are able to grind and level up so fast! Conquer thousands of vile monsters to gain experience. It’s a dream come true for every fan of hero RPG games who looks for medieval experience.

COLLECT RESOURCES
Get idle loot, gold, eternium, and upgrade your equipment. Collect armors, magic weapons with great passive skills and much more. Choose from hundreds of weapons and talent combinations that no other knight RPG games can offer.

DEFEAT MONSTERS & PLAYERS ON YOUR WAY!
Whether you’re an old school player or completely new to turn-based strategy, Questland lets you feel the thrill of multiplayer fighting like no other online RPG games. Challenge players in the PvP arena. Battle hordes of monsters in PvE mode. The more you fight in this hero role-playing game, the more XP you can get.

BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY
Questland is one of the most dynamic RPG adventure games. Start your epic journey to fight and defeat the ultimate boss - the Shadow. End the war and become a legend!

HELP YOUR GUILDMATES
Join a guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic RPG multiplayer guild raids to rule the world of Valia! Collaborate with guild members. Unite with knights and mages in the most cooperative turn-based RPG!

A real treat for every dungeons and dragons fan and one of the most interesting fantasy games out there. Prepare yourself for an adventure RPG like you’ve never experienced before!


Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.

- Multiplayer guild raids - lead your guild to victory!
- Addictive weekly Battle Events with stunning equipment as a reward

RPG with character creator
Like in most role-playing games, you have to create your epic hero from scratch. Make use of beautiful armors, mighty weapons, shields and helmets to adjust your look. Face challenging quests and events in this RPG fantasy game with thousands of ways to customize character. Get special cosmetics and skins to stand out in the crowd!

Complete hero quest with ease
Idle RPG games don’t have to be hard. Especially when you are able to level up so fast! Conquer thousands of vile monsters to gain experience. Smelt, craft, reforge, extract and make your mates jealous! It’s a dream come true for every fan of RPG online games who looks for an immersive, medieval experience.

Collect resources & essential items
Get idle loot, gold, eternium, empowering stone, and upgrade your equipment. Collect armors, almighty rings, magic weapons with great passive skills and much more. Enhance and awaken your gear and orbs: from common to legendary. Choose from hundreds of weapons and talent combinations that no other idle RPG games can offer.

Defeat monsters and players on your way!
Whether you’re an old school player or completely newbie to turn-based games, Questland lets you feel the thrill of co-op fighting like no other online RPG games. Challenge players in the PvP arena. Battle hordes of monsters grinding the PvE campaign. The more you fight in this hero role-playing game, the more XP you can get.

Begin your journey
Questland is the one of the most dynamic RPG adventure games in the role-playing genre. Explore the grim medieval world. Start your epic journey to fight and defeat the ultimate boss - the Shadow. Who will be the most victorious champion of Valia? End the war and become a legend!

Help your guildmates
Join the guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic multiplayer guild raids to rule the world of Valia! Collaborate with guild members and get rewards for the ranking. Unite with knights and mages in one of the most cooperative multiplayer RPG games!

A real treat for every dungeons and dragons fan and one of the most interesting quest games out there. Prepare yourself for an adventure RPG like you’ve never experienced before!

Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.

Get idle loot, gold, eternium, empowering stone, and upgrade your equipment. Collect armors, almighty rings, magic weapons with great passive skills and much more. Enhance and awaken your gear and orbs: from common to legendary. Choose from hundreds of weapons and talent combinations that no other idle RPG games can offer.

Defeat monsters and players on your way!
Whether you’re an old school player or completely newbie to turn-based games, Questland lets you feel the thrill of co-op fighting like no other online RPG games. Challenge players in the PvP arena. Battle hordes of monsters grinding the PvE campaign. The more you fight in this hero role-playing game, the more XP you can get.

Begin your journey
Questland is the one of the most dynamic RPG adventure games in the role-playing genre. Explore the grim medieval world. Start your epic journey to fight and defeat the ultimate boss - the Shadow. Who will be the most victorious champion of Valia? End the war and become a legend!

Help your guildmates
Join the guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic multiplayer guild raids to rule the world of Valia! Collaborate with guild members and get rewards for the ranking. Unite with knights and mages in one of the most cooperative multiplayer RPG games!

A real treat for every dungeons and dragons fan and one of the most interesting quest games out there. Prepare yourself for an adventure RPG like you’ve never experienced before!

Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.

Face challenging quests and events in this RPG fantasy game with thousands of ways to customize character. Get special cosmetics and skins to stand out in the crowd!

Complete hero quest with ease
Idle RPG games don’t have to be hard. Especially when you are able to level up so fast! Conquer thousands of vile monsters to gain experience. Smelt, craft, reforge, extract and make your mates jealous! It’s a dream come true for every fan of RPG online games who looks for an immersive, medieval experience.

Collect resources & essential items
Get idle loot, gold, eternium, empowering stone, and upgrade your equipment. Collect armors, almighty rings, magic weapons with great passive skills and much more. Enhance and awaken your gear and orbs: from common to legendary. Choose from hundreds of weapons and talent combinations that no other idle RPG games can offer.

Defeat monsters and players on your way!
Whether you’re an old school player or completely newbie to turn-based games, Questland lets you feel the thrill of co-op fighting like no other online RPG games. Challenge players in the PvP arena. Battle hordes of monsters grinding the PvE campaign. The more you fight in this hero role-playing game, the more XP you can get.

Begin your journey
Questland is the one of the most dynamic RPG adventure games in the role-playing genre. Explore the grim medieval world. Start your epic journey to fight and defeat the ultimate boss - the Shadow. Who will be the most victorious champion of Valia? End the war and become a legend!

Help your guildmates
Join the guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic multiplayer guild raids to rule the world of Valia! Collaborate with guild members and get rewards for the ranking. Unite with knights and mages in one of the most cooperative multiplayer RPG games!

A real treat for every dungeons and dragons fan and one of the most interesting quest games out there. Prepare yourself for an adventure RPG like you’ve never experienced before!

Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Online role-playing game. Fight monsters in full of action tactical battles!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added translations for guild rules, making them accessible to a wider audience.
- Fixed an issue where the battle event multiplier calculation was not handling fractional values ​​correctly.
- Addressed crashes and infinite loading screens that were occurring in certain scenarios during battles.
- Fixed an issue with player tagging.
- Resolved an issue with arena defense set changing unexpectedly after changing talent.
- Made various overall improvements to the game's stability.

RPG with character creator

Complete hero quest with ease
Idle RPG games don’t have to be hard. Especially when you are able to level up so fast! Conquer thousands of vile monsters to gain experience. Smelt, craft, reforge, extract and make your mates jealous! It’s a dream come true for every fan of RPG online games who looks for an immersive, medieval experience.

Collect resources & essential items

Enhance and awaken your gear and orbs: from common to legendary. Choose from hundreds of weapons and talent combinations that no other idle RPG games can offer.

Defeat monsters and players on your way!
Whether you’re an old school player or completely newbie to turn-based games, Questland lets you feel the thrill of co-op fighting like no other online RPG games. Challenge players in the PvP arena. Battle hordes of monsters grinding the PvE campaign. The more you fight in this hero role-playing game, the more XP you can get.

Begin your journey

title: Questland: Turn Based RPG

creator: Gamesture sp. z o.o.
descriptionHtml:
Meet the RPG game of the next generation. Create your character, collect epic gear, equip your hero with powerful artifacts and climb the rankings. And it’s just the beginning of what Questland, one of the top rated roleplay games, has to offer!

Questland features!
- Amazing storyline - defeat evil and bask in glory and fame!
- Deep character customization with hundreds of looks & skins to choose from
- Dynamic hero upgrade - level up, boost your gear, unlock magic talents
- Tons of legendary gear & mighty artifacts - ready to craft in the hero forge
- Dozens of quests & events - battle your way to the top of the ranking!
- Powerful monsters and bosses from well-known fantasy universes
- PvP arena duels - reach the top of the magic arena
- Action-packed PvE campaign - discover grim dungeons and dragons lair in tactical turn-based combat
- Variety of locations - discover the city, visit shops, craft in the forge, embark on voyages
- Multiplayer guild raids - lead your guild to victory!
- Addictive weekly Battle Events with stunning equipment as a reward

RPG with character creator
Like in most role-playing games, you have to create your epic hero from scratch. Make use of beautiful armors, mighty weapons, shields and helmets to adjust your look. Face challenging quests and events in this RPG fantasy game with thousands of ways to customize character. Get special cosmetics and skins to stand out in the crowd!

Complete hero quest with ease
Idle RPG games don’t have to be hard. Especially when you are able to level up so fast! Conquer thousands of vile monsters to gain experience. Smelt, craft, reforge, extract and make your mates jealous! It’s a dream come true for every fan of RPG online games who looks for an immersive, medieval experience.

Collect resources & essential items
Get idle loot, gold, eternium, empowering stone, and upgrade your equipment. Collect armors, almighty rings, magic weapons with great passive skills and much more. Enhance and awaken your gear and orbs: from common to legendary. Choose from hundreds of weapons and talent combinations that no other idle RPG games can offer.

Defeat monsters and players on your way!
Whether you’re an old school player or completely newbie to turn-based games, Questland lets you feel the thrill of co-op fighting like no other online RPG games. Challenge players in the PvP arena. Battle hordes of monsters grinding the PvE campaign. The more you fight in this hero role-playing game, the more XP you can get.

Begin your journey
Questland is the one of the most dynamic RPG adventure games in the role-playing genre. Explore the grim medieval world. Start your epic journey to fight and defeat the ultimate boss - the Shadow. Who will be the most victorious champion of Valia? End the war and become a legend!

Help your guildmates
Join the guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic multiplayer guild raids to rule the world of Valia! Collaborate with guild members and get rewards for the ranking. Unite with knights and mages in one of the most cooperative multiplayer RPG games!

A real treat for every dungeons and dragons fan and one of the most interesting quest games out there. Prepare yourself for an adventure RPG like you’ve never experienced before!

Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.

Create your character, collect epic gear, equip your hero with powerful artifacts and climb the rankings. It’s just the beginning of what Questland, one of the top rated role playing games, has to offer!

QUESTLAND FEATURES:
📖 Amazing story-driven gameplay - defeat evil and bask in glory and fame!
🦹‍♀️ Character customization with hundreds of looks to choose from
🔝 Dynamic hero upgrade - level up, boost your gear, unlock magic talents
🗡️ Tons of legendary gear & mighty artifacts - ready to craft in the hero forge
🏆 Dozens of quests & events - battle your way to the top of the ranking!
👹 Powerful monsters and bosses from well-known fantasy universes
⚔️ PvP duels - reach the top of the arena
🗺️ Action-packed PvE campaign - discover grim dungeons and dragons lair in tactical turn-based combat
🏰 Variety of locations - discover the city, visit shops, craft in the forge, embark on voyages
🏕️ Co-op guild raids - lead your guild to victory!
🛡️ Addictive weekly Battle Events with stunning equipment as a reward

RPG WITH CHARACTER CREATOR
Like in most roleplay games, you have to create your epic hero from scratch. Make use of beautiful armors, mighty weapons, and shields to adjust your look. Face challenging quests in this fantasy RPG with thousands of ways to customize characters.

COMPLETE HERO QUEST
RPGs don’t have to be hard. Especially when you are able to grind and level up so fast! Conquer thousands of vile monsters to gain experience. It’s a dream come true for every fan of hero RPG games who looks for medieval experience.

COLLECT RESOURCES
Get idle loot, gold, eternium, and upgrade your equipment. Collect armors, magic weapons with great passive skills and much more. Choose from hundreds of weapons and talent combinations that no other knight RPG games can offer.

DEFEAT MONSTERS & PLAYERS ON YOUR WAY!
Whether you’re an old school player or completely new to turn-based strategy, Questland lets you feel the thrill of multiplayer fighting like no other online RPG games. Challenge players in the PvP arena. Battle hordes of monsters in PvE mode. The more you fight in this hero role-playing game, the more XP you can get.

BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY
Questland is one of the most dynamic RPG adventure games. Start your epic journey to fight and defeat the ultimate boss - the Shadow. End the war and become a legend!

HELP YOUR GUILDMATES
Join a guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic RPG multiplayer guild raids to rule the world of Valia! Collaborate with guild members. Unite with knights and mages in the most cooperative turn-based RPG!

A real treat for every dungeons and dragons fan and one of the most interesting fantasy games out there. Prepare yourself for an adventure RPG like you’ve never experienced before!


Please note that although Questland is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Role-playing game online. Fight monsters, level up & complete hero quests!

title: Questland: RPG Fantasy Game

creator: Gamesture sp. z o.o.
descriptionHtml:
TREFFE DIE NÄCHSTE GENERATION VON RPG-SPIELE!
Erstelle deinen Charakter, sammle epische Ausrüstung, statte deinen Helden mit mächtigen Artefakten aus und erklimme die Rangliste. Das ist erst der Anfang dessen, was Questland, eines der bestbewerteten Rollenspiele, zu bieten hat!

QUESTLAND RPG-FUNKTIONEN:
📖 Erstaunliche Handlung - besiege das Böse und sonne dich in Ruhm und Ehre!
🦹‍♀️ Charakteranpassung mit Hunderten von Looks zur Auswahl
🔝 Dynamisches Helden-Upgrade - Steige auf, verbessere deine Ausrüstung, schalte magische Talente frei
🗡️ Unmengen an legendärer Ausrüstung und mächtigen Artefakten – bereit, in der Heldenschmiede hergestellt zu werden
🏆 Dutzende von Quests & Events – kämpfe dich an die Spitze der Rangliste!
👹 Mächtige Monster und Bosse aus bekannten Fantasy-Universen
⚔️ PvP-Arenaduelle – erreiche die Spitze der Kampfarena
🗺️ Actiongeladene PvE-Kampagne – entdecke düstere Dungeons und Drachenhöhlen in taktischen rundenbasierten Kämpfen
🏰 Vielfältige Locations – Stadt entdecken, Shops besuchen, in der Schmiede basteln, auf Reisen gehen
🏕️ Multiplayer-Gilden-Raids – führe deine Gilde zum Sieg!
🛡️ Süchtig machende wöchentliche Battle Events mit atemberaubender Ausrüstung als Belohnung

ROLLENSPIEL MIT CHARAKTERERSTELLER
Wie in den meisten Rollenspielen muss man einen epischen Helden von Grund auf neu erstellen. Verwende schöne Rüstungen, mächtige Waffen und Schilde, um Ihr Aussehen anzupassen. Stelle dich in diesem RPG-Fantasy-Spiel herausfordernden Quests mit Tausenden von Möglichkeiten, den Charakter anzupassen.

SCHLIEßE DIE HELDENAUFGABE AB
Leerlauf-RPG-Spiele müssen nicht schwer sein. Vor allem, wenn man so schnell aufleveln kann! Besiege Tausende abscheulicher Monster, um Erfahrung zu sammeln. Es ist ein wahr gewordener Traum für jeden Fan von RPG-Online-Spielen, der nach mittelalterlichen Erfahrungen sucht.

RESSOURCEN SAMMELN
Erhalte ungenutzte Beute, Gold, Eternium und verbessere deine Ausrüstung. Sammle Rüstungen, magische Waffen mit großartigen passiven Fähigkeiten und vieles mehr. Wähle aus Hunderten von Waffen- und Talentkombinationen, die kein anderes Idle-RPG-Spiel bieten kann.

BESIEGE MONSTER UND SPIELER AUF DEINEM WEG!
Egal, ob du ein Spieler der alten Schule oder ein absoluter Neuling rundenbasierter Spiele bist, Questland lässt dich den Nervenkitzel von Multiplayer-Kämpfen spüren wie kein anderes Online-RPG-Spiel. Fordere Spieler in der PvP-Arena heraus. Bekämpfe Horden von Monstern. Je mehr du in diesem Helden-Rollenspiel kämpfst, desto mehr XP kannst du bekommen.

BEGINNE DEINE REISE
Questland ist eines der dynamischsten RPG-Abenteuerspiele im Rollenspiel-Genre. Beginne deine epische Reise, um den ultimativen Boss zu bekämpfen und zu besiegen – den Schatten. Beende den Krieg und werde zur Legende!

HILF DEINEN GILDENKAMERADEN
Tritt einer Gilde von Helden bei, chatte mit Freunden und nimm an epischen RPG-Multiplayer-Gilden-Raids teil, um die Welt von Valia zu beherrschen! Arbeite mit Gildenmitgliedern zusammen. Verbünde dich mit Rittern und Magiern in einem der kooperativsten Multiplayer-RPG-Spiele!

Ein wahrer Leckerbissen für jeden Dungeons-and-Dragon-Fan und eines der interessantesten Quest-Spiele da draußen. Bereite dich auf ein Abenteuer-Rollenspiel vor, wie du es noch nie zuvor erlebt hast!


Beachte, dass obwohl Questland kostenlos zu spielen ist, unsere Nutzer Elemente mit echtem Geld kaufen können. Wenn du diese Eigenschaft nicht nutzen willst, sperre die In-App-Purchase.
descriptionShort: Rollenspiel Online - Tauche in die Welt der Fantasy-Helden ein!

A real treat for every rpg adventure games fan and one of the most interesting fantasy games out there. Prepare yourself for an adventure RPG like you’ve never experienced before!

title:

4.17.0

creator: Gamesture sp. z o.o.
descriptionHtml:
MEET THE NEXT GENERATION OF RPG GAMES!
Create your own hero, collect epic gear, equip your hero with powerful gear and climb the rankings. It’s just the beginning of what Questland, one of the fantasy role playing games, has to offer!

QUESTLAND FEATURES:
📖 Epic story-driven gameplay – defeat evil and bask in glory and fame!
🦹‍♀️ Hero customization with hundreds of looks to choose from
🔝 Dynamic hero upgrade – level up, boost your gear, unlock magic talents
🗡️ Tons of legendary gear & epic artefacts – ready to craft in the hero forge
🏆 Dozens of quests & adventures – battle your way to the top of the ranking!
👹 Powerful monsters and bosses from well-known fantasy universes
⚔️ Multiplayer game duels – reach the top of the arena
🗺️ Open world RPG - take part in adventures and quests
🏰 Variety of locations – discover the city, visit shops, craft in the forge, embark on voyages
🏕️ Co-op guild raids – lead your guild to victory!
🛡️ Addictive weekly Battle Events with stunning equipment as a reward

RPG WITH HERO CREATOR
Like in most role playing games, you have to create your epic hero from scratch. Make use of beautiful armours, mighty weapons, and shields to adjust your look. Face challenging quests in this fantasy RPG with thousands of ways to customize characters.

COMPLETE HERO QUEST
RPGs don’t have to be hard. Conquer thousands of vile monsters to gain experience. It’s a dream come true for every fan of hero RPG games who looks for medieval experience.

COLLECT RESOURCES
Get idle loot, gold, eternium, and upgrade your equipment. Collect armours, magic weapons with great passive skills and much more. Choose from hundreds of weapons and talent combinations that no other knight RPG games can offer.

DEFEAT MONSTERS & PLAYERS ON YOUR WAY!
Whether you’re an old school player or completely new to open world rpg, Questland lets you feel the thrill of multiplayer fighting like no other online RPG games. Challenge players in the PvP arena. Battle hordes of monsters in PvE mode. The more you fight in this hero role-playing game, the more XP you can get.

BEGIN YOUR FANTASY ADVENTURE
Questland is one of the most dynamic open world rpg. Start your epic journey to fight and defeat the ultimate boss – the Shadow. End the war and become a legend!

HELP YOUR GUILDMATES
Join a guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic RPG multiplayer guild raids to rule the world of Valia! Collaborate with guild members. Unite with knights and mages in the most cooperative turn-based RPG!

A real treat for every rpg adventure games fan and one of the most interesting fantasy games out there. Prepare yourself for an adventure RPG like you’ve never experienced before!

title:
Questland: RPG Fantasy Game
4.24.0

creator: Gamesture sp. z o.o.
descriptionHtml:
MEET THE NEXT GENERATION OF RPG GAMES!
Create your own hero, collect epic gear, equip your hero with powerful gear and climb the rankings. It’s just the beginning of what Questland, one of the fantasy role playing games, has to offer!

QUESTLAND FEATURES:
📖 Epic story-driven gameplay – defeat evil and bask in glory and fame!
🦹‍♀️ Hero customization with hundreds of looks to choose from
🔝 Dynamic hero upgrade – level up, boost your gear, unlock magic talents
🗡️ Tons of legendary gear & epic artefacts – ready to craft in the hero forge
🏆 Dozens of quests & adventures – battle your way to the top of the ranking!
👹 Powerful monsters and bosses from well-known fantasy universes
⚔️ Multiplayer game duels – reach the top of the arena
🗺️ Open world RPG - take part in adventures and quests
🏰 Variety of locations – discover the city, visit shops, craft in the forge, embark on voyages
🏕️ Co-op guild raids – lead your guild to victory!
🛡️ Addictive weekly Battle Events with stunning equipment as a reward

RPG WITH HERO CREATOR
Like in most role playing games, you have to create your epic hero from scratch. Make use of beautiful armours, mighty weapons, and shields to adjust your look. Face challenging quests in this fantasy RPG with thousands of ways to customize characters.

COMPLETE HERO QUEST
RPGs don’t have to be hard. Conquer thousands of vile monsters to gain experience. It’s a dream come true for every fan of hero RPG games who looks for medieval experience.

COLLECT RESOURCES
Get idle loot, gold, eternium, and upgrade your equipment. Collect armours, magic weapons with great passive skills and much more. Choose from hundreds of weapons and talent combinations that no other knight RPG games can offer.

DEFEAT MONSTERS & PLAYERS ON YOUR WAY!
Whether you’re an old school player or completely new to open world rpg, Questland lets you feel the thrill of multiplayer fighting like no other online RPG games. Challenge players in the PvP arena. Battle hordes of monsters in PvE mode. The more you fight in this hero role-playing game, the more XP you can get.

BEGIN YOUR FANTASY ADVENTURE
Questland is one of the most dynamic open world rpg. Start your epic journey to fight and defeat the ultimate boss – the Shadow. End the war and become a legend!

HELP YOUR GUILDMATES
Join a guild of heroes, chat with friends, and compete in epic RPG multiplayer guild raids to rule the world of Valia! Collaborate with guild members. Unite with knights and mages in the most cooperative turn-based RPG!

A real treat for every rpg adventure games fan and one of the most interesting fantasy games out there. Prepare yourself for an adventure RPG like you’ve never experienced before!

Please note that although Questland is free to play open world rpg, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.
